items.name: init(ringRadius: CGFloat, pipeRadius: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a torus geometry with the specified ring radius and pipe radius.

items.name: var ringRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The major radius of the torus, defining a circle in the x- and z-axis dimensions. Animatable.

items.name: var pipeRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The minor radius of the torus, defining the pipe that encircles the torus ring. Animatable.

items.name: var ringSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions around the torus ring. Animatable.

items.name: var pipeSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions around the torus pipe. Animatable.
